name: Toukidenshou: Angel Eyes
overview: Touki Denshou: Angel Eyes is an all-girl fighting arcade game, released by Tecmo in 1996. As Tecmo's first arcade fighting game, it suffers from severe balance issues where a single combo can completely drain a character's health. Since the game features a significant amount of aerial combat and unblockable juggle combos, a match will often be determined by which player strikes first.
